content: patterns by pam crocheted notions bag materials 1 skein of plymouth boku yarn 100 yards of worsted weight yarn 4 5 sts/1 g hook gauge 4 sts/1 in single_crochet glossary single_crochet - single_crochet half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet chain - chain pattern stitches simple stitch row 1 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook and in each remaining chain chain 1 turn row 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet across chain 2 turn row 3 half_double_crochet in each single_crochet across chain 1 turn row 4 single_crochet in each half_double_crochet across chain 1 turn row 5 single_crochet in each single_crochet across ch2 turn repeat row 3 through 5 for pattern pattern foundation chain chain 30 work patterns row 1-5 and then row 3-4 button hole row row 5 single_crochet in the next 13 single_crochet spaces ch2 skip next 2 single_crochet chain spaces single_crochet in next 13 single_crochet spaces continue in pattern stitch repeating row 3-5 until work measures 12 5 from founda- tion chain fasten_off last stitch by cutting the working yarn about 6 from the loop on the hook bring the yarn over the top of the hook from back to front then draw the tail all the way through the loop on the hook pull the tail to tighten and secure the last stitch © 2008 patterns by pam ~ please do not copy or reproduce pamgrushkin@optonline net finishing fold up end ws of bag
